histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",datacenter="$datacenter", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", uri!="/actuator/health", uri!="/slow/start/check"}[1m])) by (le, uri, country)) or histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(cms_http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",datacenter="$datacenter", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", uri!="/actuator/health", uri!="/slow/start/check"}[1m])) by (le, uri, country))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",status=~"2.*",datacenter="$datacenter", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", uri!="/actuator/health", uri!="/slow/start/check"}[1m])*60) by (uri) or sum(rate(cms_http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",status=~"2.*",datacenter="$datacenter", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", uri!="/actuator/health", uri!="/slow/start/check"}[1m])*60) by (uri)

sum(rate(cms_http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",datacenter="$datacenter", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", uri!="/actuator/health", uri!="/slow/start/check"}[1m])*60) by (uri) / scalar(sum(rate(cms_http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",datacenter="$datacenter", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", uri!="/actuator/health", uri!="/slow/start/check"}[1m])*60))

((sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",datacenter="$datacenter", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", uri!="/actuator/health", uri!="/slow/start/check"}[1m])*60) by (uri)) - 
(sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",status=~"2.*",datacenter="$datacenter", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", uri!="/actuator/health", uri!="/slow/start/check"}[1m])*60) by (uri))) / scalar(sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",datacenter="$datacenter", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", uri!="/actuator/health", uri!="/slow/start/check"}[1m])*60)) or ((sum(rate(cms_http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",datacenter="$datacenter", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", uri!="/actuator/health", uri!="/slow/start/check"}[1m])*60) by (uri)) - 
(sum(rate(cms_http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",status=~"2.*",datacenter="$datacenter", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", uri!="/actuator/health", uri!="/slow/start/check"}[1m])*60) by (uri))) / scalar(sum(rate(cms_http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",datacenter="$datacenter", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", uri!="/actuator/health", uri!="/slow/start/check"}[1m])*60))

max(cms_downstream_service_seconds{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",datacenter="$datacenter",quantile="0.99", downstream_type="dynamo_db"}) by (cms_function) or histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(cms_downstream_service_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",datacenter="$datacenter"}[1m])) by (le, cms_function))

max(cms_downstream_service_seconds{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",datacenter="$datacenter",quantile="0.95", downstream_type="dynamo_db"}) by (cms_function) or histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(cms_downstream_service_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",datacenter="$datacenter"}[1m])) by (le, cms_function))

max(cms_downstream_service_seconds{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",datacenter="$datacenter",quantile="0.50", downstream_type="dynamo_db"}) by (cms_function) or histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(cms_downstream_service_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace",service="$service",datacenter="$datacenter"}[1m])) by (le, cms_function))

max(jvm_threads_states_threads{datacenter="$datacenter", namespace="$namespace", service=~"$service", pod="$pod"}) by (state) or max(cms_jvm_threads_states_threads{datacenter="$datacenter", namespace="$namespace", service=~"$service", pod="$pod"}) by (state)
